results.name: a(n) = A000203(n) XOR A005187(n), where XOR is bitwise-XOR, A003987.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: (Scheme) (define (A294899 n) (A003987bi (A000203 n) (A005187 n))) ;; Where A003987bi implements the bitwise-XOR, A003987.
xref: Cf. A000203, A003987, A005187, A294898, A295296 (positions of zeros), A295297 (parity of a(n)).
